title: CITY BUDGET
advisorMessage:
Keep a close eye on your budget! You are in the red.
Options: (1) Cut services. (2) Raise taxes. (3) Zone RCI and wait.
taxWarning: "Higher taxes increase immediate revenue but severely decrease long-term commercial growth and RWA investments."

advisor.suicide: It's economic suicide! The city will be empty tomorrow!
advisor.panic: Mayor, this is theft! Businesses will close and people will flee!
advisor.industryDrop: Mayor, factories are closing! We're heading for mass unemployment!
advisor.residentialDrop: People are packing their bags! No one wants to pay this much to live here.
advisor.warning: Careful, citizens are starting to complain...
advisor.balanced: This is the sweet spot. Money is flowing in, no one is complaining too much.
advisor.generous: We are too generous, Mayor! We could double our profits.
